title: Father, son arrested on fentanyl trafficking, gun sales and immigration violations following ICE, multiagency investigation
description: A father and son were arrested for trafficking fentanyl and illegal firearms sales following an investigation conducted by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement and multiple federal and state law enforcement agencies.

title: ICE Denver removes man wanted in El Salvador
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Salvadoran national and foreign fugitive Jose Eduardo Moran-Garcia, 28, to El Salvador via air transportation. Moran is wanted in his home country for aggravated homicide, displacement of individuals, unlawful groupings and aggravated robbery.

title: ICE arrests illegal Mexican national involved in 2014 vehicular homicide of 13-year-old girl
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement arrested Ramiro Guevara, a 46-year-old Mexican national, who was involved in a 2014 vehicle accident that resulted in the death of a 13-year-old girl. Guevara was wanted for an outstanding order of deportation.

title: International law enforcement cooperation leads to takedown and immigration arrests of alien smugglers in US and Brazil
description: Extensive coordination between the United States and Brazilian law enforcement resulted in the arrest of an alien smuggler in Worcester, MA, and the execution of search warrants and arrests in Brazil, dismantling a transnational criminal organization.

title: Multiagency investigation results in Cartel Del Noreste leader sentencing for murder-for-hire, kidnapping conspiracies
description: A Cartel Del Noreste leader was sentenced for his role in a murder-for-hire scheme involving bringing hitmen across the U.S. border into Laredo.

title: Florida sex offender sentenced to 15 years for distribution of child sexual abuse material
description: A Florida man and previously convicted child predator was sentenced to 15 years in federal prison for distributing imagery and video depicting child sexual abuse on a social media application following a Northeast Florida Interagency Child Exploitation and Peoples Trafficking Task Force investigation that included U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

title: ICE arrests 72 criminal aliens during week-long multi-agency operation in the Rio Grande Valley
description: ICE, with assistance from federal, state and local law enforcement partners, arrested 72 illegal aliens, including 61 criminal aliens and two documented gang members, during a targeted enforcement operation conducted from March 16 to 22 in the Rio Grande Valley area.

title: ICE Arizona, multiagency case results in Nogales man sentenced to 10 years in prison for methamphetamine possession, intent to distribute
description: A Nogales man was sentenced to 120 months in prison followed by five years of supervised release for possession with the intent to distribute methamphetamine. The drugs were stored at a trucking yard near Nogales.

title: ICE Salt Lake City removes foreign fugitive for sexual assault of minor
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Mexican citizen and foreign fugitive Jairo Ivan Paredes Cota, 43, to Mexico via ground transportation. Paredes is wanted in his home country for the sexual assault of a minor.

title: ICE Philadelphia removes illegal alien wanted for murder to Ecuador
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Luis Gerardo Pelaez Llivichuzca, a citizen of Ecuador wanted for murder in his home country, to Ecuador.

title: ICE removes Mexican fugitive wanted for family violence
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Juan Jasso-Botello, a 44-year-old Mexican fugitive wanted in Mexico for family violence.

title: ICE Boston arrests Brazilian alien charged with assault, battery in Massachusetts
description: ICE apprehended an illegally present Brazilian alien charged with assault and battery on a family member when officers arrested Weliton Pires-Dos Santos, 39, in Framingham.

title: ICE Houston removes Guatemalan fugitive wanted for criminal impersonation
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement removed Kevin Estuardo Escobar Chanas, a 27-year-old foreign fugitive wanted for criminal impersonation in Guatemala, from the United States.

title: ICE, law enforcement partners arrest 13 illegal criminal alien offenders during Huntsville enforcement operation
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement along with law enforcement partners apprehended 13 illegal aliens in the Huntsville area. Eight of the offenders had been previously removed from the United States and have federal convictions for illegal reentry after removal.

title: ICE Boston arrests Lebanese alien charged with assault, battery, sex crime in Massachusetts
description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement apprehended Pierre Maurice Al-Asmar, an illegally present Lebanese national charged with assault and battery and indecent assault and battery on person 14 or over.

title: ICE arrests Chinese national convicted of illegally acting as agent of foreign government
description: ICE apprehended Ming Xi Zhang, a Chinese national, who was sentenced last year for acting as an agent of a foreign government without prior notification to the U.S. Attorney General. He was arrested and detained on March 24 in Newark, New Jersey and remains in ICE custody.
